channel.title: Ability to remove "back to normal" in alerts
channel.description:
Currently I'm using alerts to notify things that happen in the DB that doesn't have a trigger associated and I can check with pooling.
For example, - When a company sets a day promotion (those promotions finish at the end of the day) - Daily to check any negative rating
In those examples I want to inform when something happens without having to be inform when the query is back to normal.
I saw the code to implement this could be just as simple adding a condition here to ignore back to normal notification https://github.com/getredash/redash/blob/master/redash/destinations/mattermost.py
I wonder if either I could get a workaround or we could get a feature for this.
